meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>suck</kanji> something in and <kanji>obtain</kanji> it. Shhheewwwwww! When you suck something in and obtain it into your body, you have done <vocabulary>absorption</vocabulary> because it's been sucked inside of you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
